raw_body:
HAROLD LLEWELLYN JURIANSZ,​ born 18th June 1937,​ sadly passed away peacefully in his sleep with his loved ones by his side on 14th September,​ 2023. Harold was a wonderful husband,​ father,​ grandfather,​ great-grandfather,​ an adored family man and friend to all whose lives he has touched. Safe in the arms of Jesus,​ until we meet again. The service will be webcast live,​ to view please go to smct.org.au.
060160
